snippet.title: Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness ~ Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a trailer for the fourth Galactic Blasters game, Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness, which finally reveals the release date for the game.

Galactic Blasters D is a full-on horizontally scrolling space shmup where after enemy fleets start attacking the L.I.S.P. Space Station, a group of H.D.E. Defenders get sent out to stop them. However, the defenders end up getting thrown into a mission where they have to stop a plan called Codename: STEP.

With a 7-stage Story Mode, and a new Extra Mode (both playable in singleplayer and multiplayer), you can expect the game to be much bigger than the previous games. In addition, there's a singleplayer Classic Mode and multiplayer Battle Mode.

Itch.io Page: https://rgamesofficial.itch.io/galacticblasters4
SFGHQ Link: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/galactic-blasters-d-future-darkness-sage-22-version.1396/

RGames Discord Server: https://discord.gg/JVhfDGM6gC
